author: David Guzman

review: This was fairly easy to install into my TV: be forewarned that you also have to plug it directly into a power source.  FYI: Do your research, you can only stream from certain providers ie Hulu, Netflix, Pandora and a few others - but I believe the list is growing.  This device does not enable unlimited streaming from every provider, but it works very well for a fairly low price.  If you are a casual TV/internet streaming viewer, this is a nice-to-have-but-not-critical tech accessory.

author: EastSide

review: I bought a Google Chromecast just to try it and see how and if it worked as advertised. Since it worked so well, I decided I would three more for my non-smart TVs however, Amazon places a limit of one (1) per customer for this item. Being that I would have to re-order this item individually for each TV, plus pay the individual shipping and handling as well, I decided to check eBay. Wow! Ebay did not have a limit, the items were brand new, and I recieved all three I needed at a lower cost, no shipping, and all in one box. I can understand if I were ordering an enormous ammount, but that was not the case. Amazon or whoever set this ordering limit, needs to step it up with it and use some common sense sometimes!!!
